available_mods.name: Persistent Cards
available_mods.desc: The character card you choose at the beginning is your card for the whole game.

available_mods.name: Tobi
available_mods.desc: Enable busting. Once anyone's points is reduced below zero, the game ends.

available_mods.name: Yumeno Maho
available_mods.desc: Adds Yumeno Maho to the game.

available_mods.name: Show Waits
available_mods.desc: Add some UI that shows waits.

atarashi_ako.display_name: Swap a discard with same suit in hand

choe_myeonghwa.display_name: Swap last discard with tile in hand

kataoka_yuuki.display_name: Choose 4 tiles to place at the end of the live wall

nanpo_kazue_nonskippable.display_name: Choose 2 tiles to place at the end of the dead wall

nanpo_kazue_skippable.display_name: Choose 2 tiles to place at the end of the dead wall

onjouji_toki_start.display_name: Draw an extra tile and set it aside

shibuya_takami.display_name: Set aside a discard as next draw

amae_koromo.display_name: Move haitei tile from live wall to dead wall
